Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to the opening of liquor stores on certain days
Summary: Provides that liquor stores may open at ten am on Sundays; further allows such stores to be open on December 25th, Christmas day.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to liquor store opening times on certain days
